mapper.select: SELECT -- 1. 查询今日访问量 SUM(CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS today_visits, -- 2. 查询总访问量 COUNT(*) AS total_visits, -- 3. 查询昨日访问量（用于计算增长率） SUM(CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS yesterday_visits FROM system_login_log;

SELECT -- 1. 统计今日的独立访客数量 COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() THEN user_ip END) AS today_visits, -- 2. 统计总的独立访客数量 COUNT(DISTINCT user_ip) AS total_visits, -- 3. 统计昨日的独立访客数量（用于计算增长率） COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY THEN user_ip END) AS yesterday_visits FROM system_login_log;

SELECT -- 1. 今日登录成功的次数 COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() AND result = 0 THEN 1 END) AS today_visits, -- 2. 总登录的次数 COUNT(result) AS total_visits, -- 3. 昨日登录成功的次数 COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE (create_time) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND result = 0 THEN 1 END) AS yesterday_visits FROM system_login_log;

SELECT -- 1. 日期列表 DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS `date`, -- 2. 统计每日的PV（页面访问量） COUNT(1) AS pv, -- 3. 统计每日的UV（独立访客数） COUNT(DISTINCT user_ip) AS uv, -- 4. 统计每日登录成功次数（result = 0） COUNT(CASE WHEN result = 0 THEN 1 END) AS lv FROM system_login_log WHERE create_time BETWEEN concat(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d');
